sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import success from "../Svg/GifImages/success.gif"; export default function OrderPlaced() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); let price = 0; let Delivery = 0; location.state.element.forEach((element) => { price = price + element.Cart.state.element.price * element.Cart.state.count; }); price >= 100 ? null : (Delivery = 40); const months = [ "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Oct", "Nov", "Dec", ]; return (

Thank You

YOUR ORDER IS CONFIRMED

{" "} We will be sending you on email confirmation to example@gmail.com shortly

Order #{location.state.orderId} was placed on{" "} {months[location.state.date.getMonth()]} {location.state.date.getDate()+7}, {location.state.date.getFullYear()} {" "} and is currenty in progress

ORDER CONFIRMED

START PRODUCTION

QUALITY CHECK

DISPATCHED ITEM{" "}

PRODUCT DELIVERED

DELIVERY ADDRESS

{" "} Bhagabandh,Krishna puri colony ,putki Road, Dhanbad ,Jharkhand 828111

BELLING ADDRESS

{" "} Bhagabandh,Krishna puri colony ,putki Road, Dhanbad ,Jharkhand 828111

CONTACT DETAILS
Email@gmail.com
+919507981942
ORDER SUMMARY ({location.state.element.length})
Sub Total {price.toFixed(2)}
Delivery {Delivery}
Total {price.toFixed(2) + Delivery}
); }
